Definition: Status of participant/subject as alive or dead
Short Description: Status of participant/subject as alive or dead

Definition: Date (and time, if applicable and known) the participant/subject was discharged from the hospital
Short Description: Date (and time, if applicable and known) the participant/subject was discharged from the hospital
Disease Specific Instructions: Record the date/time according to the ISO 8601, the International Standard for the representation of dates and times (http://www.iso.org/iso/home.html).  The date/time should be recorded to the level of granularity known (e.g., year, year and month, complete date plus hours and minutes, etc.).

Definition: Type of destination on completion of stabilization/evaluation in hospital
Short Description: Type of destination on completion of stabilization/evaluation in hospital
Permissible Values: Discharge to rehabilitation unit;Discharge to other hospital;Discharge to nursing home;Discharge to home/private residence;Not applicable - patient died;Other, specify;Unknown
PV Descriptions: Discharge to rehabilitation unit;Discharge to other hospital;Discharge to nursing home;Discharge to home/private residence;Not applicable - patient died;Other, specify;Unknown

Definition: Date and time the participant/subject was discharged from the intensive care unit (ICU) of the hospital
Short Description: Date and time the participant/subject was discharged from the intensive care unit (ICU) of the hospital
Disease Specific Instructions: Record the date/time according to the ISO 8601, the International Standard for the representation of dates and times (http://www.iso.org/iso/home.html).  The date/time should be recorded to the level of granularity known (e.g., year, year and month, complete date plus hours and minutes, etc.).

Definition: Type of destination on completion of stabilization/evaluation in the intensive care unit (ICU) of the hospital
Short Description: Type of destination on completion of stabilization/evaluation in the intensive care unit (ICU) of the hospital
Permissible Values: Discharge to other ICU;Discharge to rehabilitation unit;Discharge to other hospital;Discharge to nursing home;Not applicable - patient died;Other, specify;Unknown;Discharge to general ward
PV Descriptions: Discharge to other ICU;Discharge to rehabilitation unit;Discharge to other hospital;Discharge to nursing home;Not applicable - patient died;Other, specify;Unknown;Discharge to general ward
